attributes.action: Give British citizens in the UK and abroad final referendum
attributes.background: Give British citizens in the UK and abroad the right to say if they agree to leave EU under the divorce agreement, or if they wish to stay as part of EU. Make sure please, that difference of 4% won't be recognized to be enough as binding majority

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
